articles.title: The coolest technology from Day 2 of CES 2026
articles.description: Crowds flooded freshly opened showroom floors on Day 2 of CES, met by thousands of robots, AI companions, assistants, health longevity tech, wearables and
articles.content:
Crowds flooded freshly opened showroom floors on Day 2 of CES, met by thousands of robots, AI companions, assistants, health longevity tech, wearables and more
The coolest technology from Day 2 of CES 2026By SHAWN CHEN and RIO YAMATAssociated PressTh... [5471 chars]

articles.title: IIT-B hosts design challenge
articles.description: Bhubaneswar: The Indian Institute of Technology (IIT)-Bhubaneswar hosted the ‘Design for Bharat Youth Innovation Challenge (Odisha Zone)' on its campu.
articles.content: Bhubaneswar: The Indian Institute of Technology (IIT)-Bhubaneswar hosted the ‘Design for Bharat Youth Innovation Challenge (Odisha Zone)' on its campus on Tuesday. The challenge was part of the national ‘Design for Bharat-2026' (DFB'26) initiative un... [560 chars]

articles.title: IKE Tech LLC Partners with Charlie's Holdings to Deploy Industry's First AI-Powered Age-Gating Technology
articles.description: IKE Tech LLC announced a strategic licensing agreement with Charlie's Holdings Inc. to integrate IKE's patented age-gating platform across Charlie's next-generation nicotine analogue and ENDS product...
articles.content: IKE Tech LLC announced a strategic licensing agreement with Charlie's Holdings Inc. to integrate IKE's patented age-gating platform across Charlie's next-generation nicotine analogue and ENDS product lines. Representing a watershed moment for the vap... [2577 chars]

articles.title: How modern technology is replacing legacy systems and extending their lifespan
articles.description: There is no question that each generation of technology is different from the last. In this sense, many would think that modern industrial facilities would rely on the same types of newer, more advanced equipment across the board. However, this is not the case. In an industry where many industries utilize systems that are patched […]
articles.content: There is no question that each generation of technology is different from the last. In this sense, many would think that modern industrial facilities would rely on the same types of newer, more advanced equipment across the board. However, this is no... [6465 chars]

articles.title: Bayer's Monsanto sues Pfizer, BioNTech and Moderna over messenger RNA technology
articles.description: Bayer's Monsanto has sued Pfizer, BioNTech and Moderna, for allegedly misusing its messenger RNA technology in COVID vaccines.
articles.content:
Bayer's Monsanto has sued COVID vaccine makers Pfizer, BioNTech and Moderna, for allegedly misusing its messenger RNA technology in manufacturing their vaccines.
The lawsuit in the Delware federal court was confirmed by a Bayer spokesperson on Tuesda... [1634 chars]

articles.title: This biotech company’s shares are on a tear
articles.description: 4D Medical Ltd (ASX: 4DX) has secured a contract with UC San Diego Health to use its CT:VQ technology for clinical use in lung imaging.
articles.content:
4D Medical Ltd (ASX: 4DX) has secured a contract with UC San Diego Health – one of the US's pre-eminent academic health systems – to use its CT:VQ technology for clinical use in lung imaging.
Shares in the biotechnology company jumped on the news, tr... [2385 chars]

articles.title: India’s homegrown stealth fighter dream: can Rolls-Royce make it a reality?
articles.description: The British aircraft engine maker is promising full technology transfer and local IP rights for India’s fifth-generation AMCA programme.
articles.content: In an interview with the Press Trust of India late last month, Sashi Mukandan, executive vice-president of Rolls-Royce India, said developing a next-generation engine in the country was a priority to power future Indian combat jets, including the AMC... [487 chars]

articles.title: Rashtriya Avishkar Abhiyan: 15 Ferozepur toppers fly to Ahmedabad on state-funded exposure trip
articles.description: The campaign is part of a national initiative by Union ministry of education to foster interest in Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics (STEM) among students (ages 6-18) through hands-on activities, innovation, and linking classroom learning to real life
articles.content: The campaign is part of a national initiative by Union ministry of education to foster interest in Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics (STEM) among students (ages 6-18) through hands-on activities, innovation, and linking classroom lear... [3048 chars]

articles.title: Wegmans is using facial recognition in some stores. What about yours?
articles.description: Retailers are increasingly using the technology to spot shoplifters.
articles.content:
If you’re a Wegmans shopper, Big Brother may be watching you.
The supermarket chain said it’s starting to use facial recognition technology in some stores.
Wegmans addressed its strategy after signs were posted in some Brooklyn and Manhattan stores, ... [2738 chars]

articles.title: AI Doesn't Fail Because of Technology, It Fails When Humans Misunderstand Each Other
articles.description: AI should be treated as a tool, not a substitute for human judgment. When organizations rely on it as a replacement for thinking rather than an amplifier of it, misalignment follows quickly.
articles.content: As artificial intelligence becomes embedded in nearly every industry, much of the public conversation has focused on speed, efficiency, and automation. But beneath the headlines about smarter systems and changing workflows lies a quieter and more con... [4382 chars]
